#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,n;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {int count=0;int max=100000;
    cin>>n;
    int a[n];
  for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
    cin>>a[i];        
  for(int i=0;i<=n-1;i++)
  {count=0;
  for(int j=0;j<n;j++)
  {
   if((a[j]-a[i]-(j-i))!=0)
   count++;
   
  }    
  if(count<max)
 { max=count;
 //cout<<max<<" ";
   }
   }
   cout<<max<<"\n";
  }
  return 0;
 }
